settings.editor: The 85 sq.m. Sunny Anny Suite features beautifully rustical ambiance, designed to create a unique feel of emotional warmness, and sense of weel being

tabs.tab_content: We would ask guests to respect the fact that all our rooms are no-smoking rooms. We reserve the right to charge an exceptional flat-rate cleaning fee of $180 if there is smoking in the room.

Children up to age 5 spend the night free in their parents’ room. We charge $50 per night for each additional bed for children up to age 12, and $150 per night for each additional bed for children from age 13. Additional beds are only available in the hotel.
We are glad to welcome your four-legged friend to our Eurath Hotel. The charge is $25 per night. Please, send us inquiry for pets other then dogs or cats.

settings.editor: The soothing view to nature through the big windows is the best thing about our spacious  rooms.
Browse through our beautiful  showcase of sights around town.

"I would never believe anyone trying to describe or explain what an experience is to stay in this suite. Once I stayed with my husband in "Beautuful Maria", I'm returning every year, for 8 years now ... "
